PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-07382011-06-23,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Great Lakes Pilotage Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending THE GREAT LAKES PILOTAGE REGULATIONS to allow the Authority to more effectively ensure that officers have the local knowledge required to navigate their vessel in the Great Lakes region. All domestic officers who wish to perform pilotage duties will now be required to hold a valid pilotage certificate, which will be issued by the Authority in compliance with section 22 of the Pilotage Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0136 Publication Date: 2011-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
